snippet: Two firefighters were injured while using their fire truck ladder to help a college marching band take part in an ice bucket challenge, the school's president said Thursday....

headline.print_headline: Ice Bucket Challenge Goes Awry, Firefighters Hurt
headline.main: Ice Bucket Challenge Goes Awry, Firefighters Hurt

lead_paragraph: Two firefighters were injured while using their fire truck ladder to help a college marching band take part in an ice bucket challenge, the school's president said Thursday.
